text: The Technologies in this section are focused around improving your economy and construction capabilities.\\n\\nSome technologies require [[img:icon_raw_materials]][[/img]]Raw Materials to research.
The Technologies in this section are focused around improving your military strength and recruitment capabilities.\\n\\nSome technologies require [[img:icon_armaments]][[/img]]Armaments to research.

The Technologies in this section are focused around improving your diplomatic and provincial management tools, as well as your faction's magical capabilities.\\n\\nSome technologies require [[img:icon_conclave_influence]][[/img]]Conclave Influence to research.
